channel.title: Error: T1 in client
channel.description:
Hello guys i got error in client if i log in,
I logging in and get dc with errors T1 -XX , -xx. I tried to do this on PC its working, if run server on VPS and try to log in i got this errors, anyone know how to fix it? Its NRPK Source.
